name: NETXP LINUX Anonymous File Creation
description: Monitors the use of memfd_create for creating anonymous files, which can be indicative of stealthy operations. This rule helps in detecting the creation of files in memory without touching the disk, providing insights into potential attempts to execute binaries without leaving traces on the filesystem.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "anon_file_create" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
